alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 12 at 1:38PM MDT until June 12 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 109 degrees expected this afternoon and up to 106 degrees on Monday. * WHERE...De Baca County, Quay County and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening and from 1 PM to 8 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Quay County
